summary: Provides a high‑level pipeline that integrates a variational auto‑encoder, CLIP text encoder, tokenizer, conditional UNet, diffusion scheduler, and safety checker to generate images from textual prompts and optionally perform semantic edits on the generated content.
business_intent: Enables developers and creators to produce and modify AI‑generated images based on natural language descriptions, supporting use cases such as content creation, advertising, design, and interactive media.
